eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.util

Class CachedThreadPoolScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.util.CachedThreadPoolScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler

    public class CachedThreadPoolScheduler
extends Object
implements hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler
    The scheduler uses a cached thread pool executor (via Executors.newCachedThreadPool()) as its backing thread pool. Delayed executions are performed via the TimeUnit.sleep() methods on the pool thread (consuming resources). To stop a repeating schedule, throw a CancellationException.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.05.
